form.login: Login with your email and password
form.email_error: Entered value does not match email format
form.password_error: Minimum eight characters, at least one leter, one number and one special character

welcome_page.description_title: GraphQL is an open source data query language and data manipulation language for building web-based APIs. GraphQL was developed as an internal project by Facebook in 2012 and was later released to the public in 2015.

main_page_description: You are on the welcome page Graphi QL. You are on the welcome page. If you are registered, click the 'Sing In' button. If you are not registered, click the 'Sing Up' button
